IMAGE As requested your News Alert for TXN follows from Equ ityAlertcom TI Expands Cable Modem Offerings With an Integrated IEEE Residential Gateway PlatformDNew Design Leverages Technical Expert ise in Wireless LAN and DOCSIS DALLAS Nov PRNewswire via C OMTEX A new cable modem reference platform for broadbandenabled wirele ss home networking is being introduced today by Texas Instruments Incorpora ted NYSE TXN TI The TNETC reference design incorporates TIs leadi ng data over cable service interface specification DOCSIS cable modem technology with TIs b singlechip MACbaseband processor to enable the distribution of broadband content throughout the home See tisccablemodem Our certification success with DOCSIS and techni cal expertise in made the development of a cableenabled residential gateway RG design a natural progression allowing us to deliver cable mo dem solutions that continue to extend our penetration in the market said Brett Butler general manager of Cable Broadband Communications at TI Con sumers desire for wireless home networking continues to grow and this sol ution allows us to help original equipment manufacturers OEMs bring more affordable consumer products to market quickly About the TNETC Resid ential Gateway Solution The TNETC RG solution offers a foundation for cable providers to expand service offerings to and enhance management of ne twork devices within the home through implementation of the CableLabs Cabl eHometm initiative TI is engaged with multiple third party software deve lopers for support of the RG functionality that includes Firewall Network Address Translation NAT Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol DHCP Client Server Web based management This RG referen ce design builds upon TIs DOCSIS silicon and software and incorporate s TIs TurboDOXtm software which increases the upstream capacity and per formance of the cable modem The TNETC incorporates TIs ACX singlechip MAC and baseband processor for wireless local area networks W LANs The chip supports the b standard commonly referred to as WiF i and offers a technology extension to increase the range of operation by up to percent Additionally the ACX offers Mbps extended data rate capabilities today that are forwardcompatible with elements of the new IE EE g draft standard since the chip supports PBCC for highrate wi reless networking in the GHz band Combined with TIs robust cable modem solution TIs TNETC design will allow multimedia applications to be wi relessly networked throughout the home About TI Broadband For OEMs de veloping broadband communications solutions TIs advanced signal processin gbased silicon and software platforms deliver the optimal performance low er power consumption and system level integration required to rapidly depl oy differentiated next generation products for cable modems digital subscr iber line xDSL modems integrated access devices IADs Voice over Inter net Protocol VoIP gateways carrier infrastructure and home and office w ireless networking Texas Instruments Incorporated is the world leader in digital signal processing and analog technologies the semiconductor engin es of the Internet age The companys businesses also include materials and controls and educational and productivity solutions TI is headquartered in Dallas Texas and has manufacturing or sales operations in more than countries Texas Instruments is traded on the New York Stock Exchange und er the symbol TXN More information is located on the web site at wwwtico m Please refer all reader inquiries to Texas In struments
